text: Jason Done (born 5 April 1973) is an English actor and narrator. He is best known for portraying the role of Tom Clarkson in the BBC school-based drama series Waterloo Road (2006–2013); making him the second longest-serving cast member in the show's history. He also portrayed Mordred in the 1998 mini- series Merlin and Stephen Snow in the ITV drama series Where the Heart Is (1999–2001). As well as narrating various programmes, he has portrayed minor roles on British dramas such as Peak Practice, Coronation Street, Casualty, Vera and Death in Paradise. ==Other websites== * Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:English child actors Category:English television actors Category:Actors from Greater Manchester Category:People from Salford
